description: Second Wave is a expansion mod that adds new units to both MLA and Legion. --(Enable MERGE to play with legion or other unit mods when installed!)-- New units and structures seek to expand play styles and improve factory interactions, without forcing out old ones. Still under development. See forums for more details.
author: Anonemous2, billthebluebot, Taiga, Quitch, Reckoner, Ferretmaster, Tatarstan
